name: Zago Body Buddy Chocolate 20g Protein drink

amazon:
I simply love these drinks - they're gluten-free, lactose-free, sugar-free and absolutely healthy. My tummy loves them!
being a consumable item it needs to be packed in food grade plastic bottle.However it appears that it is ordinary plastic
Wonderful taste
I absolutely love these! Handy nutrition and not super expensive... Thank the Lord for the small miracles! The shakes actually taste nice, my favorite being the coffee caramel flavor, and not something like a cardboard grinder up. It's smooth, liquid (and not the usual thick consistency) and very palatable. Does help maintain optimum nutrition and helps keep energy levels up through the day.
twitter:
1/2 Food preservatives are used to increase the shelf life, the body doesn’t understand how to break these down
Working out? Reach for a Zago, your Body Buddy. 
The buzz word on everyone’s lips is “FITNESS”. With it comes the search for a good gym, comfortable pair of workout shoes, gym wear and most importantly keeping aside time to hit the gym. In between all this we forget that nutrition and recovery for
facebook:
When I run out of protein powder, or I'm on flights.. it's the best thing ever!! But I wish the carb and fat could be a little lower for guys like me who need a real low carb diet.
This is simply the best protein shake in India & from India... Had it 6 months back from a 24x7 outlet and since then have been having it pretty regularly. 20 gm of protein in tastiest format is rocking...
I don't see any negative of this product except that availability in Delhi is bit issue.. i had to go every time to 24x7... You simply have to try this drink though. AMAZING is the word.
Amazing product. But, impossible to open! Runners cant waste time in first finding a knife on the run route and then opening it! Very badly designed and engineered PACKAGING
A very nice product! :D #ADHM2016 #NEWDELHI #STARTUPS

amazon:
Amazon + Apple = Amazable
The iphone 8 is the successor to iphone 7 which is same in much of the design but has grest improvements. Let me divide this review into pro’s and con’s
Pro’s
 1.the display has increased significantly. The display is much crisp and brighter.
2.the new apple chip with the dedicated bionic chip is lightening fast and hence the file tranfer speed has also significantly increased
3. The new back is glass hence supports wireless charging
4. The battery life has also significantly improved
5. The camera is super good and with the new chip the processing quality is super good
6. Has a improved speaker
7. The water and dust resistance has also significantly improved
Con’s:-
1. Still the asthetics remains the same
2. Has no headphone jack. Alas! Welcome to 2017
3.the back is now glass so maintain a good quality case, chances of breaking is more
4. Still the same battery and charger with no scope for fast charging with the included charger
Received the IPhone 8 today. Very quick delivery by Amazon (got delivered way before the expected date). I got a very good deal on exchange offer for my previous IPhone 6s - Nothing wrong with it, however the latest IOS 11 update was taking a toll on the ageing battery, so is the upgrade).Since visually similar to 6s to 8, initially did not feel much difference (nowhere the number 8 written on the phone that can easily be seen). However when tried to take photos of fast moving objects the improvement in camera came into instance attention. The phone itself felt very snappy and raring to go on a rampage. Restoring from the previous backup, and take it on to a spin with whatever the daily chores it has to handle.Will come back with more updates once the things are settled a bit down)PS: I got a Spigen Liquid Crystal Case ordered and put on the phone. It looks much better than the previous Neo hybrid case - just in case anyone wants to know)
filpkart:
Wow... I am the first person got it in the Bengaluru... very happy.... Phone looks very great.... excellent to use... iphone makes their brand.... ya it is almost equal to iphone 7 plus with some upgradations... worth to buy for gadget lovers... I too like that...
This is the most powerful and beautiful phone from Apple. Received today from Flipkart and I will remember the delivery for ever. Thank you ekart for a delighted delivery. Nothing much to say about phone as everyone knows Apple keep its standard high always year on year. I will definitely suggest to go for it.
Awesome phone..super fast...smooth design !
Great camera especially the portrait modes are cool..loved the 4K videos...
Con - heating issue after playing sudoku or normal games near lens area. Even in case of taking multiple pics heating issue is observed. 
Will reach out to Apple care as soon as possible. Hope it is not hardware issue n issue get resolved after next update.

amazon:
Johnsons baby hair oil has lovely smell and quantity and size of bottle is big it is a must buy for your babies and also toddlers
Using this product instead of hair serums. Products like Livon etc have glycerin this is a much better option. People with dry frizzy hair should try it.
Nothing to review as such. Satisfied with quality and delivery.

Never recommend
